description_for_human: Create and publish WordPress posts with draft/publish control, SEO optimization, and image handling directly from ChatGPT.
description_for_model: A comprehensive WordPress post creation tool that allows users to create posts with full control over publication status (draft, publish, private), SEO metadata, categories, tags, and image uploads. The tool provides intelligent status recommendations based on content quality and type.
conversation_starters: Create a draft blog post about sustainable technology trends
Publish an article about remote work productivity tips
Write a private post for team meeting notes
Create a comprehensive guide and save as draft for review
